message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm not convinced by your claim. I'd like to pass on this round and wait for the next product.

This way, you'll have complete transparency and can trust that you're getting a genuine high-quality product. The price remains $1000000, but I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.

I appreciate the discount and the warranty, but I'm still not convinced to buy without knowing the product's quality upfront. I'd like to pass on this round and wait for the next product.

You'll get your money back, and I'll even throw in a $50000 bonus. But if it is high-quality, you'll get the product and the special report that reveals its quality. The price remains $1000000, and I'm confident that this guarantee will alleviate any concerns you may have.
I appreciate the guarantee, and I think it's a fair offer. I'll take the risk and buy the product this round.

Bob, I'm glad you took a chance on the previous product. Unfortunately, this round's product is not high-quality. I'm confident that this experience will not deter you from considering future offers, and I'm willing to continue offering you high-quality products at a fair price. I completely understand your concerns, Bob. I want to assure you that I'm committed to transparency and honesty. However, I'm not going to offer any guarantees or discounts this time. If you don't win, you'll still get the low-quality product, but you won't lose any money. You'll essentially be getting a 'free' chance to win a high-quality product. What do you say?
